As Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing, Chris Polito oversees TruePositionâ€™s sales operations and marketing efforts around the globe.

A veteran of the telecommunications industry for more than 25 years, Chris has brought considerable sales management experience and leadership to TruePosition. Prior to joining TruePosition, Chris served as Vice President of Sales and Business Development for Ericsson Inc., and was responsible for wireless, data communications, VoIP, and broadband sales. In addition, Chris was President of Polito Communications Inc., an upstate New York Radio Common Carrier, before selling it to a nationwide paging operator in 1990.

Chris Polito attended the Rochester Institute of Technology and the University of Maryland.
